DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study access acceptability potential utility nutritional intervention video 1 ) change knowledge attitude healthy eating , 2 ) improve healthy food shopping practice , 3 ) enhance skill stress reduction food shopping among low-income Latina mother .
DOC.brief_title: Nutritional Video Intervention Using Mindfulness-based Principles
DOC.detailed_description: - Low income Latina mother ( N=218 ) primary grocery shopper family recruit community base organization take part study . Participation include completion survey instrument baseline , immediately follow intervention ; subset participant ( N=68 ) also complete 2-month follow-up survey provide two weekly grocery store receipt prior 1-2 month baseline 2-month followup assessment point . The survey collect data demographic , knowledge healthy eating , self efficacy , perceive stress family history relevant health issue . Grocery store receipt cod used evaluate pre-post change shop healthy v unhealthy food . The study compare two condition : control condition , participant view 14-minute video grocery shopping teach participant make healthy food choice . In intervention condition , participant view aforementioned video addition 15-minute video manage stressor arise grocery shopping . -Surveys enter manually choose database research assistant . - 100 % data entry check Project specialist accuracy . - A total 218 participant recruited partake control condition Group A Group B intervention . - Because exploratory nature study , power calculation use determine sample size . - Group x time analyse compare change knowledge , attitude self efficacy exposure video entire sample ; subsample follow 2 month , compare baseline 2-month followup change knowledge , attitude , self efficacy , mindfulness stress relate measure well behavior change food choice grocery shopping .
DOC.criteria: Identify Hispanic woman Ages : 1855 year Responsible buying grocery family Language use : Ability speak , read write English Spanish Resident USC 's Health Sciences Campus University Park Campus neighborhood
